TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListBindingConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Provides a type converter to convert objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ListBindingConverter is used to evaluate and convert a property of an object into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> is applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class with the type of the ListBindingConverter as an argument.
For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > You should never create an instance of the ListBindingConverter class. Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>. For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.

A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you want to convert to.
Docs.summary: Returns whether this converter can convert the object to the specified type, using the specified context.
Docs.returns: if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public override object ConvertTo (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value, Type destinationType);

Docs.param: An that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>. If is passed, the current culture is assumed.
The <xref:System.Type> to convert the value parameter to.
Docs.summary: Converts the given value object to the specified type, using the specified context and culture information.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.

Docs.param: An that provides a format context.

Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Object> representing the given <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>, or if the object cannot be created. This method always returns .

Docs.param: An that provides a format context.
Docs.summary: Returns whether changing a value on this object requires a call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CreateInstance%2A> to create a new value, using the specified context.
